objects.description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has obtained and used publicly-available post-exploitation frameworks and tools like Metasploit, [Empire](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0363), [Mimikatz](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0002).(Citation: FireEye KEGTAP SINGLEMALT October 2020)

external_references.description: Kimberly Goody, Jeremy Kennelly, Joshua Shilko, Steve Elovitz, Douglas Bienstock. (2020, October 28). Unhappy Hour Special: KEGTAP and SINGLEMALT With a Ransomware Chaser. Retrieved October 28, 2020.
